ygData.subject: More Pockets
ygData.msgSnippet: Why doesn t my Wrist pouch and Belt pouch  go onto those body locations?   Would I expect to carry my Ear Ring or wear it? At this point in my Players history,
ygData.messageBody:
Why doesn't my Wrist pouch and Belt pouch go onto those
body locations? Would I expect to carry my Ear Ring or wear it?

At this point in my Players history, I'm now running 3 characters
on Test and 2 on Veeshan. I've had multiple problems and I am
still trying to work those issues out. Truth has been non-human
at other than Freeport doesn't Freeze.
Any others still having this type of problem?

My first, has aquired 2 large sacks and a backpack.
Plenty of places to stash, but he's established and can afford
the items. My others are still trying to break their 2nd level.
It seems hunting is only feesible way to get coin and advance.

I would BUG them, but it seems well past Beta, this is
the acceptable norm. My point here, if I'm taking up vaulable
Hold spots and I can not stack containers ie Wrist pouch in my
large bag. WHY purchase anything less? I have not tried boxes,
please enlighten me. None of mine are smithers yet and from
the look, making a box is not a simple task.

Thanks
Cleric Taven
